snippet: “Caught,” a five-minute piece by David Parsons that stars a soloist soaring through the air and features lighting effects, is being presented by Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater.
abstract: Caught, signature work by choreographer David Parsons, features dancer performing series of leaps as strobe light freezes airborne poses; piece, performed by Kirven Douthit-Boyd, is part of Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater's season at Lincoln Center.
lead_paragraph: “Caught,” a five-minute piece by David Parsons that stars a soloist soaring through the air and features lighting effects, is being presented by Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater.

headline.seo: ‘Caught,’ by David Parsons, Performed by Alvin Ailey Dance
headline.main: He Can Fly, in a Flash, Right Before Your Eyes
headline.print_headline: He Can Fly, in a Flash, Right Before Your Eyes
